A new bug has been reported by markus@chope.co . Here are the details.
Email address markus@chope.co
Urgent? URGENT!
Severity? SEVERE!
Which Product Line? B2B ChopeBook / MR4 iPad / Queues app / Telephony
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Tables not being being unlocked
automatically.
More Details of your problem? Basically, there is an issue where once a
reservation is locked to a table and the reservation is canceled, the
system will not unlock the table automatically.
Steps to reproduce issue Make a reservation on ChopeBook. Locked the
reservation to a table. Cancel the reservation and check if you can add a
walk in on that locked table. The example that Ps.Cafe showed us is that
there was a 7:45pm reservation and they tried to enter a walk in at 7pm on
the same table.
Who is affected? ALL users
When did this first happen? At the time of this report
Can you reproduce the problem? All the time

nonEditableReason.message: To set an epic as the parent, use the epic link instead

content.text: A new bug has been reported by audrey@chope.co . Here are the details.
Email address audrey@chope.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2C [BOOK] ChopeApp / Loyalty
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Cancelled by robot reservations are
recorded in Chope-Dollar points record and are pending issuance
More Details of your problem? Made a booking via Chope website, but did not
complete the online deposit. These incomplete/cancelled by robot
reservations are reflecting as pending Chope Dollars.
Current Result (what is currently happening) User is seeing pending Chope
Dollars for reservations cancelled by robot
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) User should not see these as
pending Chope Dollars, as the reservation was never completed.
Steps to reproduce issue 1. Make a reservation at a restaurant that
requires an online authorisation hold (e.g. Bacchanalia).
2. Exit reservation process with completing the authorisation hold
3. Check Chope-Dollar Transactions
Who is affected? ALL users
When did this first happen? At the time of this report
Can you reproduce the problem? All the time
Have a screenshot / video of the problem? File 1
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1W7Y8aDmcpWWrrKx12iyiL3i-9MLBX1Lq
Restaurant Details (Name/RestaurantUID) Bacchanalia by Vianney Massot
App Version 4.8.0
Device OS and Device Type iPhone 7

Which Product Line? B2C [SAVE] ChopeApp / Shopify / Promo Code / Redemption
Portal
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Promo code is unable to be applied
again despite cancelling previous rez.
More Details of your problem? I had applied the promo code ONEFM to a rez
which I cancelled. When I tried to apply it to a new rez, it said that the
code can't be used more than once.
I believe that if a rez has been cancelled, the promo code count would be
added back. Also, this code is limited to one use per diner which might be
causing the error.

Urgent? URGENT!
Severity? SEVERE!
Which Product Line? ADMIN portal
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Restaurant Profile on CMS went BLANK
after edit Special Notes
More Details of your problem? I just edited the special notes for Fire
Restaurant, and then when i saved and re-check, suddenly the data went
blank. But when i checked the resto profile on chope.co, it still exist
there
Current Result (what is currently happening) All the data went blank after
i edit the special notes
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) All the data still exist
Steps to reproduce issue As above
Who is affected? Don't Know...
When did this first happen? At the time of this report
Can you reproduce the problem? All the time
Have a screenshot / video of the problem? File 1
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1_Gwft-BfQqDcteFXdiM0TO4tv8j27pYQ

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1EFdRX28HbHOnnT3-KMdCm0iacCkb8rwI

Bali-Seminyak)/firewseminyak1804bal

content.text: A new bug has been reported by ayu@chope.co . Here are the details.
Email address ayu@chope.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2C [BOOK] ChopeWeb / Widget
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Cannot make rez, keeps triggering to
mark checkbox
More Details of your problem? Three Buns Quayside
(threebunsquayside1808tbq) has a dropdown select for Indoor/Outdoor. When
you select Indoor, it will trigger a compulsory checkbox and Outdoor will
not trigger. But when selecting Indoor, it will ask to select compulsory
checkbox even though there is none. Refer to screen record attached. I have
since removed the compulsory checkbox triggered for selecting Indoors as it
is affecting diners from making reservations.
Current Result (what is currently happening) Not being able to make rez
when selecting outdoors
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) Should be able to make rez when
selecting outdoors
Steps to reproduce issue I have removed it as it prevents diners from
making reservations in real time
Who is affected? ALL users
Have a screenshot / video of the problem? File 1
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1IGlgekh9HGGxKFNa7E_xpE4TBaEyAKue

nonEditableReason.message: To set an epic as the parent, use the epic link instead

A new bug has been reported by hiro@chope.co . Here are the details.
Email address hiro@chope.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2B ChopeBook / MR4 iPad / Queues app / Telephony
Brief Description (One Line Summary) The table assigned to a guest is
different from the overview (list) vs what's on the reservation details.
More Details of your problem? Please see attached screenshot and video. The
booking ID: 4FOKH at UNION PIK AVENUE
Current Result (what is currently happening) As attached. When you see the
reservation under the upcoming bookings, it is assigned to Table X. But
when you tap on the reservation to see the booking details, the tables
assigned to this booking is Table Y. This has happened a few times before -
we first noticed it at Sarong Group, where bookings were assigned to tables
that didn't even exist (and this was different from when you see it under
upcoming bookings vs when you tap on the booking to see the details).
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) The tables should be the same
whether you are looking at the booking list, or drilling down to look at
the booking details.
Steps to reproduce issue See video attached
Who is affected? ALL users
When did this first happen? At the time of this report
Can you reproduce the problem? Most of the time
Have a screenshot / video of the problem? File 1
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1fTmj0ToZAiZUNqwuHsVHJhe049CJaMtu
File 2 <
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1qWkQnAjOntJ2PitkNx-TOX3YCjVzw5rA
Login Details (Username/Password) Use the Union Support login details we
gave to tech
Restaurant Details (Name/RestaurantUID) Union PIK Avenue / unionpik1707jkt
App Version Latest app
Device OS and Device Type iPad 2017

content.text: A new bug has been reported by shermin@chope.co . Here are the details.
Email address shermin@chope.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2C [BOOK] ChopeWeb / Widget
Brief Description (One Line Summary) OTP Verification: No button to
continue after diner keys in the OTP.
More Details of your problem? Two diners have reported that there is no
button for them to submit the OTP and continue making a reservation for
restaurants that require OTP verification. Both mentioned that they were on
their laptops, and one of them tried on both internet explorer and google
chrome browsers and both did not have the button for them to submit the OTP
to make the reservation.
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) There should be a button for
the diner to click to submit the OTP and continue making the reservation.
Steps to reproduce issue As I have already verified my own mobile number, I
am unable to reproduce this.
Who is affected? Only one or some users
When did this first happen? At the time of this report
Can you reproduce the problem? Only once
Have a screenshot / video of the problem? File 1

content.text: A new bug has been reported by felicia@chope.co . Here are the details.
Email address felicia@chope.co
Urgent? Quite Urgent
Severity? Quite Severe
Which Product Line? B2C [SAVE] ChopeApp / Shopify / Promo Code / Redemption
Portal
Brief Description (One Line Summary) Partially fulfilled Orders do not
appear in Summary data if extracted on the day itself
More Details of your problem? Wild Honey Mandarin Gallery has written to us
that they were unable to locate voucher redemption information for 4 orders
on the fulfillment day itself.
For eg (Voucher 626218106933 and 638263361589 did not reflect after summary
data is extracted from Voucher Redemption Portal on 19th Oct. These 2
vouchers belong to partially fulfilled orders. However, we are able to see
the data right now after the daily sync at 12am.
Current Result (what is currently happening) Partially fulfilled Orders do
not appear in Summary data if extracted on the day itself, until the next
day.
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) All fulfilled voucher
information should reflect in the summary data immediately.
Who is affected? Only one or some users
When did this first happen? Oct 19, Oct 20
Restaurant Details (Name/RestaurantUID) Wild Honey at Mandarin Gallery
(Vendor Code- 0310whm Restaurant RID- wildhoneymg35dfs95r2)

session on 4 Nov for booking on ResPAK, but on Chope there are no brunch
timings available, only dinner timings as shown in the screenshots. Timings
are not showing up on Chope app as well. Able to help us check please?
Expected Result (what do you expect to see) Brunch timings should be
available for booking on 4 Nov.
Steps to reproduce issue Try to make reservation at Colony for 4 Nov at
12pm.
Who is affected? Only one or some users
When did this first happen? At the time of this report
Can you reproduce the problem? All the time
Restaurant Details (Name/RestaurantUID) Colony/4634

www.chope.co

The plates - crafted by stupendous chef Petrina Loh - offers a diverse range of food that draws on a myriad of flavours, ingredients, and techniques. The result is an informal and int ...More
> Email	reservations@morsels.com.sg
